text: (Hud alajhissalom) guft: «Azoʙu xasmi Parvardigoraton hatman ʙar sumo nozil xohad sud. Ojo dar ʙorai in ʙuthoe, ki xud va padaronaton ʙa in nomho guzostaed va Alloh hec dalele ʙar onho nozil nasoxtaast, ʙo man sitezavu munoqisa mekuned? Pas intizor ʙosed azoʙi Allohro, hamono man ham ʙo sumo muntazir hastam»
